trans-unit.source: Defines a group of type faces having a similar basic design and certain variations in styles.
trans-unit.target: Define um grupo de ter um design semelhante básico e algumas variações estilos de faces de tipo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> from the specified generic font family.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> da família de tipo de letra genérico especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.GenericFontFamilies"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.GenericFontFamilies"> </xref> partir do qual criar o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: Passing empty string ("") for the `name` parameter causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: Passar uma cadeia vazia ("") para o `name` parâmetro faz com que uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: name is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameé uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- name specifies a font that is not installed on the computer running the application.
trans-unit.target: - ou - name Especifica um tipo de letra que não está instalado no computador que executa a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: -or- name specifies a font that is not a TrueType font.
trans-unit.target: - ou - name Especifica um tipo de letra que não é um tipo de letra TrueType.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> especificado no <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref> com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o nome do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> that contains this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref> que contém esta <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: name is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameé uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- name specifies a font that is not installed on the computer running the application.
trans-unit.target: - ou - name Especifica um tipo de letra que não está instalado no computador que executa a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: -or- name specifies a font that is not a TrueType font.
trans-unit.target: - ou - name Especifica um tipo de letra que não é um tipo de letra TrueType.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos utilizados por este <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>para possível reatribuir porque para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>.</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>foi occupying.</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> </xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>.</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> and is identical to this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o objeto especificado é um <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> e é idêntica a esta <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de teste.

trans-unit.source: if obj is a and is identical to this ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if obj is a and is identical to this ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains all the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with the current graphics context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz que contém todos os <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos associados ao contexto de gráficos atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with the current graphics context.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos associados ao contexto de gráficos atual.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic monospace <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um monospace genérico <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that represents a generic monospace font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> que representa um tipo de letra monospace genérico.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic sans serif <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um serif sans genérico <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> object that represents a generic sans serif font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objeto que representa um tipo de letra genérico sans serif.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic serif <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um serif genérico <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that represents a generic serif font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> que representa um tipo de letra serif genérico.

trans-unit.source: Returns the cell ascent, in design units, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the specified style.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o ascent célula, em unidades de design, do <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> do estilo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> that contains style information for the font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de estilo para o tipo de letra.

trans-unit.source: The cell ascent for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that uses the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ascent de célula para este <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> que utiliza especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the cell descent, in design units, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the specified style.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o descendente de célula, em unidades de design, do <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> do estilo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> that contains style information for the font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de estilo para o tipo de letra.

trans-unit.source: The cell descent metric for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that uses the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A métrica de descendente de célula para este <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> que utiliza especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height, in font design units, of the em square for the specified style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura, em unidades de estrutura de tipo de letra, do quadrado IT para o estilo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> for which to get the em height.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> para o qual obter a altura de IT.

trans-unit.source: The height of the em square.
trans-unit.target: A altura do quadrado it.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains all the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects available for the specified graphics context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz que contém todos os <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos disponíveis para o contexto de gráficos especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object from which to return <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto a partir do qual devolver <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects available for the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objetos disponíveis para especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: graphics is .
trans-unit.target: graphics is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um código hash para este <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O código hash <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the line spacing, in design units, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the specified style.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o espaçamento de linha em unidades de design, do <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> do estilo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The line spacing is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text.
trans-unit.target: O espaçamento de linha é a distância vertical entre as linhas de base de duas linhas consecutivas de texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> a aplicar.

trans-unit.source: The distance between two consecutive lines of text.
trans-unit.target: A distância entre duas linhas consecutivas de texto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name, in the specified language, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o nome, o idioma especificado, isto <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To indicate language neutral, you should specify 0 for the `language` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar o idioma neutro, deve especificar 0 para o `language` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of the available languages and sublanguages, see the Winnt.h header file.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem dos idiomas disponíveis e sublanguages, consulte o ficheiro de cabeçalho Winnt.h.

trans-unit.source: If you have [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] installed, this header file can typically be found relative to the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] installation directory at \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] instalado, este ficheiro de cabeçalho pode normalmente ser encontrado relativa a [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] diretório de instalação em \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include.

trans-unit.source: The language in which the name is returned.
trans-unit.target: O idioma em que o nome é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name, in the specified language, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o nome, o idioma especificado, isto <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> enumeration is available.
trans-unit.target: Indica se especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> enumeração está disponível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> para testar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref> está disponível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome deste <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o nome deste <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: Converte esta <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> para uma representação de cadeia legível por humanos.

trans-unit.target: A cadeia que representa esta <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>.
